nodes.text: Daven Tam was a Human male who served as a member of the Balmorran resistance during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, he was to transport Force-sensitive Balmorrans offworld and bring them to Tython where they become Jedi. However, the Empire was aware of their whereabouts and sent a squad of troops and Sith to exterminate them. He tasked a Republic spacer to assist him in finding the Force-sensitives inside the Zaros research facility before the Imperials find them.
